src:
Ovo Masih Eror: Top-Up, Beli Makanan dan Bayar Grab Terganggu
06 Nov 2019, 10:11 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ovo (CNN Indonesia/Eka Santhika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Pengguna pembayaran digital Ovo masih mengalami gangguan hingga Rabu pagi (6/11). Bila kemarin (5/11) pengguna Ovo tidak bisa masuk ke Ovo dan saldo Ovo menunjukkan angka Rp0. Pengguna juga mengeluh mengalami gangguan penambahan saldo (top-up) Ovo.






Pengguna juga mengeluh soal saldo terpotong saat membeli pulsa. 



Pengguna juga ada yang melakukan penarikan dana dari Gopay ke Ovo, tapi hingga saat ini belum masuk ke saldo Ovo.



Seorang Warganet mengeluhkan saldo Ovo tidak bertambah padahal ada transfer dana yang masuk ke akunnya.



Bahkan ada seorang Warganet yang melewatkan waktu pembayaran 30 detik, tapi saldo tetap terpotong.



Sebelumnya, gangguan terjadi pada aplikasi utama Ovo hingga ke beberapa layanan gandengan Ovo seperti Grab dan Tokopedia. Pengguna tak bisa masuk ke aplikasi Ovo. Saldo Ovo di Tokopedia dan Grab pun tertulis Rp0.Gangguan ini ternyata tidak hanya terjadi di aplikasi, tapi pengguna juga tidak bisa melakukan pembayaran dengan menggunakan Ovo di pedagang rekanan Ovo.Berdasarkan pantauan CNNIndonesia.com Selasa malam (5/11), Ovo masih tak bisa digunakan untuk membeli makanan di dua gerai berbeda. saat hendak membeli makanan di salah satu pusat perbelanjaan."Maaf mas, Ovo sedang maintenance. Tidak bisa dipakai," jelas kasir gerai tersebut.Selain itu, sebagian pengguna juga tak bisa melakukan transaksi menggunakan Ovo di aplikasi Grab lantaran saldo Ovo mereka Rp0, seperti dialami Eka, seorang pegawai swasta. Pengguna lain juga mengeluhkan Ovo mereka tak bisa terhubung ke Grab.



Tapi, sebagian pengguna lain tetap bisa menggunakan pembayaran menggunakan Ovo pada layanan Grab. "Kemarin malam sama pagi ini bisa kok bayar Grab pakai Ovo. Saldo di Grab juga juga utuh," jelas Sri Sulastri, seorang pegawai swasta kepada CNNIndonesia.com, Rabu (6/11). Pengakuan serupa juga dituturkan Christie, seorang karyawan swasta lain di Jakarta. Menurutnya semalam ia tetap bisa membayar Grab menggunakan Ovo. Tapi, Ovo tak bisa digunakan untuk melakukan pembayaran di gerai. Selain itu aplikasi Ovo juga tak bisa dibuka. (jnp/eks)
text:
Ovo Still Error: Top-Up, Buy Food and Pay for Disturbed Grabs
Nov 6 2019, 10:11 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ovo (CNN Indonesia / Eka Santhika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Ovo digital payment users still experience interference until Wednesday morning (6/11). If yesterday (11/5) Ovo users could not enter Ovo and Ovo balances showed a figure of Rp. Users also complained of having an Ovo top-up balance.






Users also complain about truncated balances when buying credit.



There are also users who withdraw funds from Gopay to Ovo, but until now they have not entered Ovo balance.



A citizen complained about the Ovo balance not increasing even though there was a transfer of funds into his account.



There is even a citizen who passes the payment time of 30 seconds, but the balance remains truncated.



Previously, disruptions occurred in Ovo's main application to several Ovo trailer services such as Grab and Tokopedia. Users cannot enter the Ovo application. Ovo's balance in Tokopedia and Grab was written at Rp. This disturbance apparently not only occurred in the application, but the user also could not make payments using Ovo at Ovo's partner traders. Based on CNNIndonesia.com monitoring Tuesday night (5/11), Ovo was still unable can be used to buy food at two different outlets. when I want to buy food in one of the shopping centers. "I'm sorry, Ovo is in maintenance. Can not be used," explained the cashier of the outlet. In addition, some users also can not make transactions using Ovo in the Grab application because their Ovo balance is IDR experienced by Eka, a private employee. Other users also complained that Ovo could not connect to Grab.



But, some other users can still use payments using Ovo on the Grab service. "Yesterday evening the same morning, how come you can pay Grab using Ovo. The balance at Grab is also intact," Sri Sulastri, a private employee, told CNNIndonesia.com, Wednesday (6/11). A similar acknowledgment was said by Christie, another private employee in Jakarta. According to him last night he could still pay Grab using Ovo. But, Ovo cannot be used to make payments at outlets. In addition, the Ovo application cannot be opened. (jnp / ex)
